content: the **gingerbread house granny square** is part of the christmas granny square collection the gingerbread house is crocheted separately as an applique and later sewn on the granny square **materials** 4 0-mm g/6 us 8 uk hook 3 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk hook 3-light/dkyarn tapestry needle **size** 5 5 14 cm if you use aran-weight yarn and a 5 5-mm hook the final size of the square is ~ 7 18 cm **yardage** 8 yds for the round center 22 yds for squaring to see more of my projects and patterns visit me on facebook and instagram here www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 1 www facebook com/raffamusadesigns 2 1 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
